organization.name: Year Animal - Chinese Zodiac Calculator
organization.description: Free online Chinese zodiac calculator to find your animal sign and element

acceptedAnswer.text: The Chinese zodiac is a 12-year cycle where each year is represented by an animal sign. Combined with the five elements, it creates a 60-year cycle used in Chinese astrology.

mainEntity.name: How do I find my Chinese zodiac sign?

acceptedAnswer.text: Simply enter your birth year in our calculator. Your zodiac animal is determined by the year you were born according to the Chinese lunar calendar.

mainEntity.name: What are the 12 Chinese zodiac animals?

acceptedAnswer.text: The 12 animals are: Rat, Ox, Tiger, Rabbit, Dragon, Snake, Horse, Goat, Monkey, Rooster, Dog, and Pig. Each appears once every 12 years.

mainEntity.name: What are the five elements in Chinese astrology?

acceptedAnswer.text: The five elements are Wood, Fire, Earth, Metal, and Water. Each element cycles every two years and adds another layer of meaning to your zodiac sign.
